llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1 (March 1st): Detroit to La Crosse

* Depart from Detroit at 8:00 AM
* Flight F3642011 from Detroit to La Crosse, WI ($68)
* Arrive in La Crosse at 11:47 AM
* Check-in at a private room accommodation in La Crosse ($150 per night)
* Explore downtown La Crosse and the surrounding area

Day 2 (March 2nd): La Crosse

* Full-day sightseeing tour of La Crosse, including the Historic Downtown District, the La Crosse Logging Museum, and the Grandad Bluff Park ($70)
* Lunch at a local restaurant ($15 per person)
* Return to private room accommodation in La Crosse for rest

Day 3 (March 3rd): La Crosse to Appleton

* Depart from La Crosse at 8:00 AM
* Flight F3643159 from La Crosse to Appleton, WI ($107)
* Arrive in Appleton at 9:21 AM
* Check-in at an entire home/apartment accommodation in Appleton ($180 per night)
* Explore downtown Appleton and the surrounding area

Day 4 (March 4th): Appleton

* Full-day sightseeing tour of Appleton, including the Fox Cities Performing Arts Center, the Appleton Museum of Art, and the Paper Valley Winery ($60)
* Lunch at a local restaurant ($15 per person)
* Return to entire home/apartment accommodation in Appleton for rest

Day 5 (March 5th): Departure from Appleton

* Check-out from accommodation in Appleton
* Flight F3642011 from Appleton to Detroit ($68)
* Arrive in Detroit at 11:47 AM

Budget Breakdown:

* Accommodations: $600 (private room in La Crosse, entire home/apartment in Appleton)
* Transportation: $320 ($107 flight from La Crosse to Appleton, $68 flight from Appleton to Detroit)
* Tours and activities: $450 ($70 sightseeing tour in La Crosse, $60 sightseeing tour in Appleton, $15 lunch at a local restaurant each day)

Total budget: $3,200

Note: Prices are approximate and may vary based on seasonality and availability.
